boardgame.name: Legendary: Villains – A Marvel Deck Building Game
boardgame.description: The Legendary universe gets flipped upside down in Legendary: Villains _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Marvel Deck Building Game, and you can now play as villains trying to take out the heroes protecting the city!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The goal of the game remains roughly the same as in the first Legendary game as players can work both with and against other players to overcome obstacles that the game throws at them. In this case, however, players use the super villains of the Marvel Universe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; including Venom, Magneto and Loki _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; to battle superheroes such as the X-Men, the Avengers and Spider-Friends._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Legendary: Villains _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Marvel Deck Building Game is a standalone game that includes all the cards needed to play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 78-- Star Studded Origins 2014 Wrap Up

listing.notes: Upper Deck Entertainment (UPR82415) The Legendary universe gets flipped upside down! Play as Villains trying to take out the Heroes protecting the city! The game will feature some of Marvel_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s greatest Villains, including Venom, Magneto and Thanos, as they go to battle against some of the most heroic characters in the Marvel Universe, including the X-Men, the Avengers and Spider-Friends! Players can work both with and against other players to overcome the protectors of the city using the greatest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe!

Players can work both with and against other players to overcome the protectors of the city using the greatest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe!
